Today, we launched two Arab initiatives to promote tolerance, coexistence and familiarity in our region and to consolidate these values ​​among generations, a prize for tolerance and an institute for tolerance.
We have announced an Arab prize for tolerance for any intellectual, literary or aesthetic creativity or youth project that calls for and enshrines the value of cultural tolerance among peoples.
The new award will work with young people and encourage their artistic, cultural and visual productions, especially on social media, to consolidate tolerance in our region
We also launched today the International Institute for Tolerance to develop studies and research on the root causes of intolerance and support researchers and specialists in this field
The International Institute for Tolerance will also provide research contributions to education systems to strengthen the value of tolerance among our young Arab generations

There must be intellectual and cultural reconstruction of our societies to establish coexistence and tolerance, and no guarantee for sustainable development and stability of societies without the value of tolerance
